title: as a jungle main, let me tell you about bullshit.
body:
trying to Gank a midlane who is a {{champion:7}} 
normally, i'd wait till she uses her dash, well both of them, until i can actually consider ganking, and even then she can still go back to her place.

but that's not the thing, no...ohhhhohoho no.

it's the fact that when i'm ganking, my midlaner is still undergoing the shock that leblanc caused to thier health.
making them feel uneasy about going for the gank. and oh man, did i mention leblancs ALWAYS have flash? like, what the fuck woman?

i honestly never feel this useless when playing jungle as much as leblanc makes me feel.


and no, not just her, then there's this asshole {{champion:105}} 
like no, what kind of a human being who rushes zhonyas on Fizz? but wait, it gets even better.

they build max CDR. because fuck you, and fuck all the champions that you like.

there's absolutely nothing i could do when fizz is ahead, he's got enough mobility to kill my midlane, and run away.

and let's not forget about spamming laugh and fill the chat with "LMAO ROFL LOOOOOL" because we all know how ggwp that was, yup.

i have a better chance killing heimer in the middle of all his turrets with no MR whatsoever with Crit chance lux than ganking those fucks.


TL;DR: who's idea was it to buff leblanc?
also while we're at it, Fuck Fizz.

replies.body: try playing good jungle champs who dont have to cheese noobs in order to impact the game

or, even crazier

Gank bot for once.

Bot is the hardest lane to gank. The support need to clear up ward just before the gank, and you need to engage them before. Also, it's the lane where you get the less from your numerical advantage, and a botlane with a few kill can transform the gank into a triple kill.

Basicaly, you need lot of communication for a gank bot to be succesfull, and that don't happens in soloQ. And even with communication, it's still hard to gank.

The whole point of having a support with the adc is to protect them in lane and make them harder to gank.

That being said bot lane ganks are the most impactfull b/c it frees up you adc for dragon and towers

Please say im not the only jungle main who finds bot easier to gank than mid .-.
But then again...i forget there is a top lane sometimes :'D

**The real reason top lane is never ganked**

{{champion:98}}: Enemy laner too strong... send help.
{{champion:254}}: Ok, I'm coming top, help me lock down...
*Sees laner is a {{champion:23}}*
{{champion:254}}: Y-you know, o-on second thought I think I'll just... farm... the enemy jungle.

{{champion:84}} "Jung please I really need your help Top."

{{champion:33}}" OK... "*sees Illaoi* ping targets her when she is right next to ally tower and engages.

{{champion:420}} *outright duels Rammus and starts winning because tentacles 

{{champion:84}} *just farms while Rammus dies*

{{champion:33}} *frantic pinging for assistance and dies*

{{champion:84}} *Finally runs up to wounded Illaoi and kills her*

{{champion:33}} "You know what... next time you need help, ask mid. I'm not coming back...."
more like{{champion:84}}  finally runs up to the enemy Illaoi and dies as well

> [{quoted}](name=Melledoneus,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=vE1BLn6H,comment-id=000000000001000000000000,timestamp=2016-01-16T20:31:15.218+0000)
>
> **The real reason top lane is never ganked**
> 
> {{champion:98}}: Enemy laner too strong... send help.
> {{champion:254}}: Ok, I'm coming top, help me lock down...
> *Sees laner is a {{champion:23}}*
> {{champion:254}}: Y-you know, o-on second thought I think I'll just... farm... the enemy jungle.

Yeah, top champions tend to be the strongest in early-mid when ahead, so ganking them is hell.


I say this as a {{champion:8}} main. I tend to joke with my friends that my favorite jungler is the enemy's.
oh yeah these vlad mains. haha. and then they feed and call for ganks while they literally contribute ZERO to a gank.

> [{quoted}](name=AyRe CoNteMpT,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=vE1BLn6H,comment-id=00000000000100000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-01-16T22:37:12.678+0000)
>
> oh yeah these vlad mains. haha. and then they feed and call for ganks while they literally contribute ZERO to a gank.

Whom, Vlad mains? Then they suck at Vlad. A Vladimir should never need a gank, and a jungler should only gank a Vlad lane if flash is burned or the enemy is pushing to the tower. 

If you're talking about the enemies, then believe me, their contribution can sometimes be deadly. 

With Spellvamp runes and Hextech, a Vlad can rock 18% spellvamp at level 6 easily. With his multi-targeted Es and ult, plus his pool nullifying damage for a small bit, sometimes a jungler gank that would have been successful gets turned into a double kill for me because the low-health/half-health laner just had to "help". The number of times I escape with 50-100 HP thanks to the health the enemy gave me alone is outrageous.

Being a multirole player, I hate when jg mains say 'i can't gank that champ' or 'we won't get a kill anyways'. Just forcing someone out of lane and maybe blow their flash is worth a gank. There's so many times I see a jg complaining about some lane feeding when they've never even tried to countergank the hard camp that's happening.

> [{quoted}](name=octavian1127,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=vE1BLn6H,comment-id=0000000000010000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-01-17T02:19:21.420+0000)
>
> Being a multirole player, I hate when jg mains say 'i can't gank that champ' or 'we won't get a kill anyways'. Just forcing someone out of lane and maybe blow their flash is worth a gank. There's so many times I see a jg complaining about some lane feeding when they've never even tried to countergank the hard camp that's happening.

Here's the thing. If the Vlad is any good, you won't push him out of lane. He'll just retreat back to his tower, then wait the minion wave and W cooldown and gain back most of his health. Worst case scenario you'll have wasted time just to burn a teleport and all you managed was making him come back stronger. 

There are some times where ganking a lane plainly isn't worth it, and if Vlad is winning the lane (like, one-two kills/levels ahead and he already went base) then it is much more effective to try to snowball other lanes to try to get that midgame power that Vlad doesn't have and tell your laner to play passive and just take it like a good bitch. That, or coordinate with your midlaner and get a 3 man gank, and hope no one dies to take him down. Â´

Note: this only applies if Vlad is ahead. If he's even or behind, camp that motherfucker and feed off him as hard as you can.
I was playing top once and I pinged and asked repeatedly for help and my jungler straight up said in chat "sorry bro, top lane is an island"
well better dont pick soraka vanye into thresh lucian if you want a gank
The last time my jg ganked my lane was 6 games ago, if you can call walking up after we're dead a gank. It doesn't matter what I pick or whether I'm winning or losing. They just don't gank.
hey i have a pro tip for you: learn how to lane properly so you dont have to rely on ganks anymore.
Great. So that can apply to every lane, so bot should get ganked 1/3rd of the time instead of never.
yes it sould apply to every lane and no lane should ever HAVE to get ganked.
Then the jungler should never have to leave the jungle and just constantly farm?

the jungler should have to fight over mapcontrol with the other jungler and when all lanes play properly, thats also the only thing he can do because you cant just fucking gank someone. it would allow the jungler to farm more so more champions who have later powerspikes at like 1 or 2 completed items could jungle efficiently. its not that they are weak, some of them are even extremely strong but they have less cheese potential than lee sin and co so as long as laners play like shit, cheesing is the best option.

> [{quoted}](name=AyRe CoNteMpT,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=vE1BLn6H,comment-id=000000000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-01-16T20:44:29.702+0000)
>
> the jungler should have to fight over mapcontrol with the other jungler and when all lanes play properly, thats also the only thing he can do because you cant just fucking gank someone. it would allow the jungler to farm more so more champions who have later powerspikes at like 1 or 2 completed items could jungle efficiently. its not that they are weak, some of them are even extremely strong but they have less cheese potential than lee sin and co so as long as laners play like shit, cheesing is the best option.

Well, you're half right. That's the reason you see junglers like {{champion:421}} {{champion:60}} and {{champion:36}}. Mundo can farm all game and still be massive, and his ganking is fine with his massive spammable slow. The other two can show up in a lane and practically {{champion:86}}-tee a flash if not a kill. Besides, if all your lanes are dominating, you can just tower dive or pick up a turret kill.

> [{quoted}](name=disregardable,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=vE1BLn6H,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2016-01-16T11:47:28.472+0000)
>
> The last time my jg ganked my lane was 6 games ago, if you can call walking up after we're dead a gank. It doesn't matter what I pick or whether I'm winning or losing. They just don't gank.

They can't gank if your dead. This is what every bot lanes does:

1. Push lane
2. Get ganked
3. Go back and push lane again
4. Get ganked
5. Then ask why isn't our jg ganking?

Don't push lane unless you can kill the other player.

And when you're on the opposite side, hugging turret while the enemy laners over extend, ask why jg isn't ganking: "Their bot lane is too OP, I can't gank ". 

And when the lane is sitting exactly in the middle, ask why jg isn't ganking: "I can't do anything to that lane, I can't gank"

And when you've already lost your turret because you've been 3v2 the whole game, ask why jg isn't ganking: "You lost your lane, I can't gank"

You forgot
6. Jungler pings he's coming
7. Jungler engages
8. Bot keeps farming

> [{quoted}](name=LocutusofBorg013,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=vE1BLn6H,comment-id=000000000000000000010001,timestamp=2016-01-17T03:48:12.154+0000)
>
> You forgot
> 6. Jungler pings he's coming
> 7. Jungler engages
> 8. Bot keeps farming

Thanks and glad to know it isn't just me.

There is nothing more tilting to me than a lane asking for a gank and then do nothing when I show up. If you are too low to contribute, make that known before hand. I can cover and reroute into a gank when you return. I swear, misunderstandings are what ruin even the best of team comps.
The best is when all 3 lanes are ungankable champions.

{{champion:150}} top
{{champion:7}} mid
{{champion:64}} jungle
{{champion:40}} / {{champion:412}} / {{champion:223}} support 
{{champion:18}} / {{champion:429}} adc

Find a team like this and the enemy jungler can just stay at nexus because they can't gank, counter jungle, or stay in their own jungle unless they're extremely good.

{{champion:77}} "But why would I leave my jungle? All this farm is calling my name."

*Casually walks into enemy jungle*

{{champion:238}}: "Uh... Udyr. You're walking into-"

{{champion:77}}: "My jungle, yes. I've already cleared the other 3, including that weird monster that gives you 300 gold."
Kalista can 1v1 kill Udyr while taking 0 damage with nothing but boots, runaan's and BF sword.
You'd be stupid to waltz into a bear's cave while it's enjoying a meal. Especially if it's a well-fed bear.
Bear hunters with harpoons do it all the time. That's why Udyr isn't doing shit in pro play where Kalista is everywhere.
Nobody uses harpoons to hunt bears, or any land mammal for that matter.
You've ruined my plans of a nice weekend out harpooning bears.

Oh god I just spilled my water.

My friend plays Udyr and this is exactly how he plays.
you want bs how about this damage dealers like lee can deal damage early ez with very little but but tanks can not tank for shit early im sick off being nuked in 3secs at lvl 4 on a tank by 1 person
could you translate yourself, i don't understand what you try to say...

Translation:

> You want bullshit? How about this: Damage dealers like Lee Sin can easily deal damage early with very little gold, but tanks can not tank for shit early. I'm sick of being nuked in 3 seconds at level 4, as a tank, by 1 person.
Lol still better than lee fucking up then kicking you away.
Why does {{champion:8}}'s troll pool have a significantly longer cooldown than the troll pole of {{champion:105}}? That's all I want to know.

b/c its red and riot hates red.  Red buff has less health b/c they like blue better.  Its everywhere man.  Even the league icon has blue

Rito is racist towards red

Your missing important facts here. We still have health pots, they removed mana pots. And isn't riot's logo red? They're biased against green, no green buff, no green pots, no more green wards, and what color is swain with ult? Guess who got nerfed a few patches ago.
#antigreenbias2k16

Oh boy more QQ about leblanc and Fizz  I thought we where past this.
were*

I agree. Fizz is wildly overpowered.

Leb is a bit too strong but not as much as Fizz.
Neither are OP, but both are disgusting to play against, just because they lack a lot of counterplay. Anyway, at least you can dodge Fizz's ult. LeBlanc just fucks you.

"You can dodge Fizz's ult".

{{champion:34}} SAY THAT TO MY FUCKING FACE.
